titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on pro-jet cyan 1 RO feed and pro-jet cyan OF 1 RO feed.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/14/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on copper phthalocyanine substituted with sulphonic acids and sulphonoamides, sodium salts (pro-jet cyan 1 RO feed and pro-jet cyan OF 1 RO feed).
